game.name: Bayaya
game.genres: Adventure, Casual, Indie, Simulation, Early Access
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Camera Comfort, Color Alternatives, Custom Volume Controls, Playable without Timed Input, Stereo Sound, Partial Controller Support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: A story-driven fairytale adventure with relaxing life-sim elements: explore a handcrafted world, help villagers through honest work, and follow the journey of Prince Bayaya and his talking horse.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A story-driven fairytale adventure with relaxing life-sim elements: explore a handcrafted world, help villagers through honest work, and follow the journey of Prince Bayaya and his talking horse.
